textos_fuente.text: Privacy Policy - Joia Beach Restaurant & Beach Club On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Reservations On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Privacy Policy joia beach privacy policy Joia Beach Privacy Notice​ Updated: january 2020 This privacy policy (“policy”) will help you understand how Joia Beach (“us”, “we”, “our”) uses and protects the data you provide to us when you visit and use www.joiabeachmiami.com (“website”, “service”). We reserve the right to change this policy at any given time, of which you will be promptly updated. If you want to make sure that you are up to date with the latest changes, we advise you to frequently visit this page. Information collection, use and sharing We only have access to collect information that you voluntarily give us via email or direct contact from you via our contact forms. We will not sell or rent this information to anyone.  We will use your information to respond to you, regarding the reason you contacted us. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links that lead to other websites. If you click on these links, we are not held responsible for your data and privacy protection. Visiting those websites is not governed by this privacy policy agreement. Make sure to read the privacy policy documentation of the website you go to from our website. Contact Us If you have any questions regarding our privacy policy, please contact Joia Beach Customer Support as follows, email: hello@joiabeachclub.com Paradise Found JOIA BEACH @ Jungle Island 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail Miami, FL 33132 ph: 305.400.7280 FOLLOW US HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm CONTACT US Reservations Team General Inquiries Press Inquiries Join Our Team All rights reserved © 2025 JoiaBeachMiami.com | Privacy Policy - Accessibility Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility

Joia Beach Miami – Waterfront Dining, Drinks & Private Events On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Reservations On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Welcome to Joia Beach — a hidden enclave in the heart of miami , where city energy meets coastal serenity. Nestled between the rhythm of the city and the beauty of nature, our vibrant restaurant and beachfront oasis invites you to indulge, unwind, and experience the magic. The Restaurant Enjoy a culinary escape on the sand or under our palapa. The restaurant blends refined European flavors with vibrant Miami energy. Dine under swaying palms, sip craft cocktails, and savor dishes made to match the view. Explore More The Beach Club Where days stretch long, and the soundtrack never stops. The Beach Club is your beachfront paradise — complete with plush beach chairs and cabanas, shoreline food & beverage service, and water access. Explore More The Beach Lounge Just steps from the shoreline, The Lounge offers a more intimate way to unwind. Sink into our loungers in the sand, indulge in cocktails and bites, and be immersed in the music of DJs, live entertainers and more! Explore More On the Menu Freshly-sourced seasonal ingredients are the core of joia beach’s culinary program, where classic techniques meet modern influences. Private Events Perfect for sunset cocktail affairs, waterfront private dinners, and elegant outdoor galas, joia beach offers seasonally-inspired cuisine, friendly refined service, and fresh handcrafted cocktails. Inquire Now Event Spaces Gallery PARKING Valet is available for $20 Ride sharing is encouraged Self-parking is only available at Jungle Island ARRIVALS BY YACHT Arrivals by yacht are not permitted at this time. PETS With the exception of service animals, no pets are allowed. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. JET SKIS Jet skis are not permitted DRESS CODE At Joia Beach , we embrace a European-inspired, upscale beach chic dress code to maintain the elevated experience our guests expect. Proper attire is required for entry, and management reserves the right to refuse access or ask guests to leave if dress code guidelines are not followed. Joia Beach has 3 main areas, the restaurant, the lounge, and the beach club. While we understand that guests visiting our beach may be dressed in beachwear, we ask that appropriate cover-ups be worn when entering the venue. Swimsuits are only permitted within the beach club & lounge areas. Shirts, bottoms, and shoes are required in the restaurant. Note that fishnet cover-ups, offensive clothing, athletic apparel, hoodies, sweatpants, tank tops, cargo pants and slides worn with socks are not permitted in any area of the venue . We appreciate your cooperation in helping us create a refined environment for all. Mailing List Sign up to receive joia beach news, updates, events and invitations Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. First Name * Last Name * Email * Submit Happenings Social Club It is here that you'll discover , exclusive interviews with the people who make up the heartbeat of our hidden oasis , insider features, and the cultural narrative that is uniquely joia beach. Paradise Found JOIA BEACH @ Jungle Island 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail Miami, FL 33132 ph: 305.400.7280 FOLLOW US HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm CONTACT US Reservations Team General Inquiries Press Inquiries Join Our Team All rights reserved © 2025 JoiaBeachMiami.com | Privacy Policy - Accessibility Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility ×

Joia Beach Miami Menu – Gourmet Bites, Seafood & Cocktails On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Reservations On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact On the Menu Sun Kissed Flavors of Europe Experience a carefully curated menu with seasonal specials A Culinary Escape Welcome to Paradise—a refined dining experience inspired by the vibrant, sun-kissed flavors of the Mediterranean. Our thoughtfully curated menu invites you to slow down and savor every bite, from traditional Greek spreads and fresh crudos to handmade pastas and expertly crafted dishes from land and sea. Each plate blends bold flavors with elegant simplicity, creating a truly soul-nourishing experience. Our Menu Miami Spice Sunset Hour Sweet Escape Lunch Lounge & Beachclub Cocktails Riviera Brunch Our Cocktails Paradise Found JOIA BEACH @ Jungle Island 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail Miami, FL 33132 ph: 305.400.7280 FOLLOW US HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm CONTACT US Reservations Team General Inquiries Press Inquiries Join Our Team All rights reserved © 2025 JoiaBeachMiami.com | Privacy Policy - Accessibility Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility

Joia Beach Event Spaces – Stunning Private Parties & Moments On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Reservations On The Menu Happenings Groups & Events Information & Contact Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Host Your Event For large groups over 10 people in size only Special Events at Joia Beach Perfect for sunset cocktails, waterfront dinners, and elegant outdoor galas, Joia Beach offers seasonally inspired cuisine, refined service, and fresh handcrafted cocktails. Our events team ensures seamless planning from start to finish, having worked with top clients across luxury, fashion, crypto, and entertainment. We host group dining, semi-private events, and full buyouts for up to 500 guests on our bayfront property. Boho vibes meet upscale luxury, with lush walkways and Tulum-inspired décor creating a magical, one-of-a-kind setting. Whether a wedding, corporate function, or brand activation, Joia Beach is your ideal event destination. Inquire Now Explore our Spaces click each area to view our event galleries Restaurant Palapa Beach Lounge Palapa Bar Terrazzo Chef's Corner The Canopy Shoreline  / Beach Club Secret Beach  Reception Space* Paradise Found JOIA BEACH @ Jungle Island 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail Miami, FL 33132 ph: 305.400.7280 FOLLOW US HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm CONTACT US Reservations Team General Inquiries Press Inquiries Join Our Team All rights reserved © 2025 JoiaBeachMiami.com | Privacy Policy - Accessibility Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility

JOIA BEACH RESTAURANT & BEACH CLUB 1111 PARROT JUNGLE TRAIL MIAMI FLORIDA 33132 We are located on the furthest west end of jungle island PHONE 305.400.7280 EMAIL Reservation & General Inquiries reservations@joiabeachclub.com Press Inquiries hello@joiabeachclub.com Join Our Team careers@joiabeachclub.com RESERVATION & GENERAL INQUIRIES please send all reservation and general inquiries to: reservations@joiabeachclub.com or please leave your information below and we will get in touch. Thank you for contacting us! We will reply as soon as possible! Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Full Name * Phone Your Email * Your Message * Send By submitting your contact information, you will be subscribed to our joia beach mailing list. you may opt-out at any time About Hidden behind a picturesque pathway encompassed by lush jungle greenery and ambient lighting, sits Joia Beach , a day-to-night dining destination located in an exclusive enclave on Watson Island. here, sun-drenched sands, sweeping views of biscayne bay and the city skyline, and vibrant pink-hued golden sunsets await. Opened in 2020 and designed by Francois Frossard, Joia Beach has been hailed by condé nast traveler as one of " the best beaches in Miami ." Described as one of the best places in Miami Beach for "those craving a slick beach scene away from Miami Beach’s masses," Joia Beach is Miami's ultimate hidden oasis. Perfect for sunset cocktails, waterfront dinners, and weekend festivities, Joia Beach has quickly become renowned as one of the best Miami beach clubs and restaurants in the magic city. European inspired bites and platters designed for sharing, handcrafted cocktails, and live djs and entertainment redefine South Beach dining and transport you to a place of pure joia . Information HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm PARKING & VALET Valet is available for $20 Ride sharing is encouraged Self-parking is only available at Jungle Island ARRIVALS BY YACHT Arrivals by yacht are not permitted at this time. PETS With the exception of service animals, no pets are allowed. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. JET SKIS Jet skis are not permitted GIFT CARD Purchase Gift Cards FAQs View Our FAQ's What is the dress code? At Joia Beach , we embrace a European-inspired, upscale beach chic dress code to maintain the elevated experience our guests expect. Proper attire is required for entry, and management reserves the right to refuse access or ask guests to leave if dress code guidelines are not followed. Joia Beach has 3 main areas, the restaurant, the lounge, and the beach club. While we understand that guests visiting our beach may be dressed in beachwear, we ask that appropriate cover-ups be worn when entering the venue. Swimsuits are only permitted within the beach club & lounge areas. Shirts, bottoms, and shoes are required in the restaurant. Note that fishnet cover-ups, offensive clothing, athletic apparel, hoodies, sweatpants, tank tops, cargo pants and slides worn with socks are not permitted in any area of the venue . We appreciate your cooperation in helping us create a refined environment for all. Can I bring my own food or beverages to the beach or restaurant? No external food or beverages are allowed to be brought on to the property. Can I shoot professional photography at joia beach? We do not allow professional photography on the beach or at the restaurant without prior approval. Joia Beach charges a location fee for photographers or brands who want to shoot on site. Can I bring my own decorations and balloons for a birthday party? No external decorations are allowed at Joia Beach without prior approval. Is there self-parking at joia beach? The only self-parking available is at Jungle Island’s main parking garage and the cost is $20. Is gratuity included? Automatic service charge of 20% will be added. 23% service charge will be added to groups of 11 or more Is smoking allowed? No tobacco, cigars or electronic cigarettes are allowed to be smoked under the palapa/inside the restaurant. Smoking is allowed in the designated areas on the beach only. Are children allowed? Children are more than welcome to join us during the day in the dining room, but Joia Beach is not a kid-friendly environment. Guests must be 21+ to enter the Beach Club and Lounge from Friday through Sunday. Are service animals allowed? In accordance with titles II and III of the ADA, Joia Beach welcomes service dogs only. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. With the exception of service animals that meet the federal government’s guidelines for animals trained to perform tasks for the benefit of an individual with a qualifying disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), visitors are not permitted to bring animals on to joia beach property. Visitors may not bring any other animals onto Joia Beach property, including but not limited to pets or emotional support animals. Is there a corkage fee? We do not allow external alcohol to be brought on to the property. Is Joia Beach wheelchair accessible? Yes, we are wheelchair accessible and have ADA bathrooms on Jungle Island’s property right next door. How much is the valet? Our valet is $20 and can be paid with cash or a credit card. How many people does the restaurant seat? 120 people. What's the largest group number I can book for the restaurant? Parties over ten people fall under our large group dining agreements. Can I purchase gift cards for Joia Beach? Gift cards for Joia Beach restaurant may be purchased at the link here Are drones allowed at Joia Beach? Drones may not be operated or used at Joia Beach without prior approval from management under any circumstances. Does Joia Beach offer towel rentals? Yes! Towels are available for rent in our lounge for $15 each. In The Press View Press Coverage Paradise Found JOIA BEACH @ Jungle Island 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail Miami, FL 33132 ph: 305.400.7280 FOLLOW US HOURS OF OPERATION Monday: 11:30am - 8pm Tuesday: closed Wednesday & Thursday: 11:30am - 8pm Friday & Saturday: 11:30am - 10pm Sunday: 11:30am - 9pm CONTACT US Reservations Team General Inquiries Press Inquiries Join Our Team All rights reserved © 2025 JoiaBeachMiami.com | Privacy Policy - Accessibility Please ensure Javascript is enabled for purposes of website accessibility

The only self-parking available is at Jungle Island’s main parking garage and the cost is $20. Is gratuity included? Automatic service charge of 20% will be added. 23% service charge will be added to groups of 11 or more Is smoking allowed? No tobacco, cigars or electronic cigarettes are allowed to be smoked under the palapa/inside the restaurant. Smoking is allowed in the designated areas on the beach only. Are children allowed? Children are more than welcome to join us during the day in the dining room, but Joia Beach is not a kid-friendly environment. Guests must be 21+ to enter the Beach Club and Lounge from Friday through Sunday. Are service animals allowed? In accordance with titles II and III of the ADA, Joia Beach welcomes service dogs only. Service dogs must be housebroken as well as harnessed, leashed, or tethered to their accompanying individual. With the exception of service animals that meet the federal government’s guidelines for animals trained to perform tasks for the benefit of an individual with a qualifying disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), visitors are not permitted to bring animals on to joia beach property. Visitors may not bring any other animals onto Joia Beach property, including but not limited to pets or emotional support animals. Is there a corkage fee? We do not allow external alcohol to be brought on to the property. Is Joia Beach wheelchair accessible? Yes, we are wheelchair accessible and have ADA bathrooms on Jungle Island’s property right next door. How much is the valet? Our valet is $20 and can be paid with cash or a credit card. How many people does the restaurant seat? 120 people. What's the largest group number I can book for the restaurant? Parties over ten people fall under our large group dining agreements. Can I purchase gift cards for Joia Beach? Gift cards for Joia Beach restaurant may be purchased at the link here Are drones allowed at Joia Beach? Drones may not be operated or used at Joia Beach without prior approval from management under any circumstances. Does Joia Beach offer towel rentals? Yes! Towels are available for rent in our lounge for $15 each.
